column4: I'm trying to map the extra buttons on 3 use mice that i use simultaneously, 2 Gyration Air mice and a Logitech marblemouse. Should I do it via the i xorg.conf.d config files or is there a program you guys can recommend?
Depends what you want to do.  Quite a lot can be done with ccsm, but I don't think that allows per-mouse settings.  xorg.conf.d is almost certainly your must flexible solution.
Probably an xorg config-file deal, then, yes.  Not an expert on that, I'm afraid, but you'll probably find one in here somewhere.
I think i know what to do for the marble mouse  but i havent been able to find to much documentation on the remapping the gyration air mouse in linux
